t = int(raw_input())
for i in xrange(t):
    n = int(raw_input())
    p = [int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
    r = [int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
    p.sort()
    r.sort()
    l = 0
    cp = 0
    for j in p:
        for k in xrange(l,n):
            if j <= r[k]:
                cp += 1
                l = k + 1
                break
    print cp
